sentences.en: ‘Did it come as a surprise to you?’ ‘Yes and no.’.
sentences.cn: “这对你来说是意外吗？”“既是也不是。”。
“你想来个三明治吗？”“好的，谢谢。”

sentences.en: ‘Would you like to come with us?’ ‘Yes, I’d love to.’
sentences.cn: “你想和我们一起去吗？”“好的，我很乐意。”

sentences.en: "Did I wake you?" — "Yes, but it doesn't matter."
sentences.cn: “我把你吵醒了？”——“是的，不过没关系。”

sentences.en: "Have you been to York before?" — "Yes we have."
sentences.cn: “你们以前去过约克吗？”“是的，去过。”

sentences.en: "Yes, Mum," replied Cheryl as she slowly put away her doll.
sentences.cn: “是的，妈妈。”谢里尔一边慢慢地收起布娃娃一边回答。

sentences.en: "Yes," he muttered, his voice so muted I hardly heard his reply.
sentences.cn: 他小声说：“是。”声音低得我几乎听不到。

sentences.en: "Yes," he replied, though it sounded suspiciously like a question.
sentences.cn: “是”,他答道,但听起来语气中充满了疑问.

sentences.en: Ah yes, but think of all the family life they're missing.
sentences.cn: 是这样，不过别忘了他们错过了多少天伦之乐。

sentences.en: As each boy said yes, he ticked their name.
sentences.cn: 随着男孩们依次答到，他在他们的名字旁打了钩。

sentences.en: Experts say a "yes" vote is still the likely outcome.
sentences.cn: 专家说结果仍可能是投赞成票。

sentences.en: He has produced his own sports magazine called Yes Sport.
sentences.cn: 他推出了自己的体育杂志，叫做《是的，体育》。

sentences.en: He was sitting there saying, "Yes, the figures make sense."
sentences.cn: 他坐在那儿说：“是的，这些数字可以理解。”

sentences.en: I said yes. I can't very well say no.
Mr Wade answers both questions with a qualified yes.
sentences.cn: 韦德先生对两个问题给出了不完全肯定的回答。

sentences.en: They must have a definite replay， yes or no.
sentences.cn: 他们必须得到一个要么是要么非的明确回答。

sentences.en: Will she say yes when I ask her out?
sentences.cn: 我约她出去，她会答应吗？

sentences.en: Yes, I know who you mean. Yes, now I'm with you.
sentences.cn: 是的，我知道你说的是谁。是的，我现在明白你的意思了。

sentences.en: Yes, I want to share my life with you.
sentences.cn: 是的，我想和你共度一生。

words.tran_cn: 是,行,好的,当然,对,完全对

trans.tran_en: used as an answer to say that you want something or want to do something
used as an answer to say that you want something or want to do something
英文释义: to give a positive response to a question
